tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.14
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS True output_data_CATEGORIES $output_data_CATEGORIES output_data_COINCIDENCE $output_data_COINCIDENCE output_data_MAJ_COUNT $output_data_MAJ_COUNT output_data_MAJ_VALUE $output_data_MAJ_VALUE name SAGA.statistics_grid.14 GRIDS $GRIDS RADIUS $RADIUS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CATEGORIES $OutputSection_CATEGORIES.outputType_CATEGORIES transmissionMode_CATEGORIES $OutputSection_CATEGORIES.transmissionMode_CATEGORIES outputType_COINCIDENCE $OutputSection_COINCIDENCE.outputType_COINCIDENCE transmissionMode_COINCIDENCE $OutputSection_COINCIDENCE.transmissionMode_COINCIDENCE outputType_MAJ_COUNT $OutputSection_MAJ_COUNT.outputType_MAJ_COUNT transmissionMode_MAJ_COUNT $OutputSection_MAJ_COUNT.transmissionMode_MAJ_COUNT outputType_MAJ_VALUE $OutputSection_MAJ_VALUE.outputType_MAJ_VALUE transmissionMode_MAJ_VALUE $OutputSection_MAJ_VALUE.transmissionMode_MAJ_VALUE

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CATEGORIES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CATEGORIES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_COINCIDENCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_COINCIDENCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_MAJ_COUNT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MAJ_COUNT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_MAJ_VALUE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MAJ_VALUE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates for each cell the categorical coincidence, which can be useful to compare different classifications.
